account_selection_strategy.description: Strategy for selecting accounts. 'sticky' stays on same account until rate limited, 'round-robin' rotates every request, 'hybrid' uses health scores

pid_offset_enabled.description: Enable PID-based offset for initial account selection (useful for parallel sessions)

max_rate_limit_wait_seconds.description: Maximum seconds to wait for rate limit before switching accounts

failure_ttl_seconds.description: Time in seconds after which failure counts are reset

rate_limit_wait_enabled.description: Enable waiting before rotating to preserve prompt cache (v1.2.0)

rate_limit_initial_wait_seconds.description: Initial wait time for exponential backoff in seconds (v1.2.0)

soft_quota_threshold_percent.description: Skip accounts with failure rate >= this percentage (v1.2.0)
